message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,400,000. It's a valuable asset that will be worth even more to you. I'm confident you'll find it a good deal. Let me know what you think.

Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay $1,300,000 for it. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth to me. I look forward to your response.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not comfortable going that low.  $1,350,000 is the best I can do at this time. It's still a great deal for you, considering the value you'll get from the product. Let's make this happen.
